entry.value: Shows how to set a plotly plot as the node view.

import knime.scripting.io as knio%%00010import plotly.express as px%%00010%%00010# Convert the input data to pandas%%00010df = knio.input_tables[0].to_pandas()%%00010%%00010# Plot a histogram of the first column%%00010fig = px.histogram(df, x=df.columns[0])%%00010%%00010# Assing the output view%%00010# The framework will figure out how to display the figure%%00010knio.output_view = knio.view(fig)%%00010
